oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch - 1949-01-08 - Part 1 -- Hillbilly Hit Parade - 1949-01-08 (excerpt)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch, originally broadcast 1949-01-08 (part 1) over the CBS network. Featuring Gene Autry, Johnny Bond, Pat Buttram, the Cass County Boys, the Pinafores, Carl Cotner, with announcer Lou Crosby. Sponsored by Wrigley's Gum. Recording begins with an excerpt of KRLD (Fort Worth, TX) program Hillbilly Hit Parade, 1949-01-06, with host 'Johnny'. In this excerpt, Gene Autry announces he is to appear in Dallas, TX 'next Monday' (presumably 1949-01-09).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gene Autry; Cass County Boys; Pinafores; Carl Cotner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hillbilly Hit Parade 1949-01-06 excerpt -- Theme (Back In The Saddle Again) -- Opening statement (Lou Crosby) -- Shame On You (Gene Autry) -- Wrigley's Gum commercial (Lou Crosby, Gene Autry) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; Gene Autry's Melody Ranch (Radio program); Cass County Boys (Musical group); Bond, Johnny, 1915-1978; Buttram, Pat; Pinafores (Musical group); Cotner, Carl; Crosby, Lou; CBS Inc.; KRLD (Radio station : Dallas, Tex.); Hillbilly hit parade (Radio program)
